name: Skynet Rising : Portal to the Past
description: Isaac spent most of his life serving under the vicious mutant rebel leader, Commander Crugo. Upon discovering a digital weapon of mass destruction, Isaac fears for humanity and flees with his wife and brother to keep the intel from falling into Crugo's hands. Seeking revenge for the betrayal, Crugo hunts down Isaac and destroys his life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5500 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-3770K or AMD FX 8350 Wraith Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480 or NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Any
